snippet.title: Banira Shio - Gameplay
snippet.description:
This game was an entry for the 37th Ludum Dare jam. It has been developed in 72 hours by Yolanda Mojena and Eric Oliver. It was highly inspired by the japanese anime Toradora and we really hope you enjoy playing it as much as we did making it!

Free download on itch.io:
https://etherealwhisper.itch.io/banira-shio

LD#37 entry:
http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-37/?action=preview&uid=46707

Deliver love while performing amazing flight manoeuvres, achieve combos and score as much as you can!

Banira Shio is an arcade flying simulator (why not?) in which you must deliver love notes from pupil to pupil under the attentive look of Sensei (҂⌣̀_⌣́), who will shoot stars through his eyes in order to increase your delivery speed! To deliver a letter simply fly through it and leave it on the desk of the pupil who matches the envelope's color and gender symbol. You can deliver several letters if they are addressed to the same destinatary.
